docs.lead_paragraph: Edith Jinwright Brown had her first baby in Mount Sinai Hospital. "I liked the way they cared," she said, "the staff, all the people I met. All the services have a slogan, 'We care.' They do care."

headline.main: Lack of Money Spurs Both Sides in Strike

docs.abstract: strike scene at Mt Sinai Hosp, NYC, described; exec vp Dr S David Pomrinse says new Medicaid rate has cut hosp's reimbursement below '75, increasing its deficit by $1.6-million; illus (M)
docs.snippet: Edith Jinwright Brown had her first baby in Mount Sinai Hospital. "I liked the way they cared," she said, "the staff, all the people I met. All the services have a slogan, 'We care.' They do care."
